general_advisory: Due to low temperature, apply thin layer of dry FYM on nursery to maintain the temperature. Start sowing the summer crops when the temperature is conducive for germination.

advisory: Apply light irrigation in the nursery.
Keep standing water in the paddy nursery 15 days onwards of sowing.
Apply 4 kg urea at 15 days for proper vigor of seedlings.
Use light and medium varieties of seeds.
National high yielding pulses varieties: IPM-02-14, IPM-02-3, PDM-11, PDM-54, Durga, Samrat, K-851, Sarla, PU-31, PU-30, PU-35, PU-19.
Collect and sow 25 kg of seeds per hectare.
Apply gypsum at sowing if not applied.
Harvest at maturity.
Apply 200 grams of mustard oil or til oil per quintal to reduce moth infestation.
Apply 200 grams of mustard oil or til oil per quintal to reduce moth infestation.
Transplant seedlings in specified spacing.
Apply NPK as per soil requirements.
Control black spot disease with carbendazim.
Pay attention to watering during flowering.
Apply gypsum at sowing.
Harvest at ripen stage and store seeds properly.
Spray with abamectin or ethion if leaf spot appears.
Apply nitrogen at specified time and go for thinning operation.
Complete sowing without delay.
Use good varieties with specified seed rate and eye count.
Apply sulphur powder for powdery mildew.
